title: InuYasha Movie 1: Affections Touching Across Time
alternative_title: InuYasha: Toki wo Koeru Omoi, 犬夜叉 時代を越える想い
description: Menoumaru, a demon and son of Hyoga, who has been sealed by Inuyasha's father 200 years ago, desires the power of Tetsusaiga for a special task. But instead of asking Inuyasha for it, he takes Kagome hostage and tricks him. The result is that Menoumaru turns even more powerful than before.Together with his female demon underlings Ruri and Hari he manages to turn friends into foes and lovers into haters.
